document_data.name: Volo's Guide to the Lands of Intrigue
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volo's Guide to the Lands of Intrigue''''' was a book written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. It was a travelogue about the realms of [[Amn]] and [[Tethyr]], two realms in the [[Lands of Intrigue]]. It was written over [[1369 DR|1360]] to [[1370 DR]].

Around [[1372 DR]], a copy was in the holdings at [[Candlekeep]].

[[Elminster]] shared excerpts and an incomplete draft of ''Volo's Guide to the Lands of Intrigue'' with chroniclers on [[Earth]], who published it as ''[[Volo's Guide to Baldur's Gate II]]''.
